::KitKat::

She nodded. "It appeares that the Allience has more enimies than 
origianlly thought. But what is my garauntee that you won't turn on 
me when this battle is over? Sure I will need reasureance."

DarkMouse twitched her nose at them. She listened to what was going 
on and keeping a sharp eye out. 



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "dachande" <Dachande85@m...> wrote:
> ::Magmatron/Dachande::
> 
>     "Yes, I did," He said. Then he turned to Dachande, who 
converted to robot mode. "Go and help them." Dachande did.
>     He turned back to Kit Kat. "I don't know what your plans are 
for the Alliance, but you have my word that I will use all my troops 
to help. But something struck me, I don't know if you thought of it: 
War by Attrition. I don't know our numbers, or thiers, but it seems 
that if we send one massive attack we might suffer more casualities 
then if we sent a group of let's say ten. Then when they get the word 
the retreat and another group of ten starts to attack.
>     "This proboly only work if we could repair the troops. Meaning 
a CR Chamber area. I have CR Chambers and portable generators that 
can be in a good position within the hour. But we would also need 
Autoguns, and my base doesn't have extra.
>     "That is why I am coming to you, I would like to help you, in 
return for your help in the future."
>     He finished looking her in the eye. He made a slight bowing 
movement.
>   ----- Original Message ----- 
>   From: logomorph@h... 
>   To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
>   Sent: Monday, November 13, 2000 5:04 PM
>   Subject: Re: Message to Kit Kat
> 
> 
>   :KitKat::
> 
>   She opened her comlink. "Destructor, you'd better get back here. 
>   We're movng. Now."
> 
>   She saw on the scanners that Magmatronw as outside the base.
>   She opened her link. "DarkMouse, meet me at the entrance."
>   She gave Quickstrike the co-ordinants to the  new base. "Get 
everyone 
>   over there. I'll follow shortly."
> 
>   DarkMouse walked over to the entrance and met with KitKat.  
KitKat 
>   motioned for the mouse to follow her to the meeting with 
Magmatron.
> 
> 
>   KitKat looked at Magmatron. "Yes, you wanted to talk?"
> 
> 
>   --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "dachande" <Dachande85@m...> wrote:
>   > ::Magmatron/Dachande::
>   > 
>   >     "Understood," He said and shut the comm down. Then he 
opened a 
>   comm to 'Dachande'. "Cyber...Dachande, please meet me outside Kit 
>   Kat's base, you are helping we with a situation, it might provide 
>   some hunting."
>   >     "No way," Dachande said, then a shock of electricty went 
>   through him. "Did you do that?"
>   >     "Yes, of course," Magmatron said. He then pressed another 
>   button and Dachande transformed to Beast Mode, decloaking in the 
>   process. He then went to Kit Kat's base.
>   >     Magmatron set the autoguns and went to Kit Kat's base.
